title: Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930–39
medium:
Medium:  silk, glass beads, spangles
Technique: embroidered
description: Off white chiffon embroidered with a basketweave pattern worked in white seed beeds and irridescent spangles.  Design is worked in a U shape configuration with the pattern printed along the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930–39.
1930–39. Medium:  silk, glass beads, spangles
Technique: embroidered. Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-4.
